Uses of Interface
net.threescale.api.v2.Api2

  • Packages that use Api2 
    Package Description
    net.threescale.api
    This API is used to encapsulate the communication with the 3scale backend server for validating and reporting transactions between the user and the provider of a service.
    net.threescale.api.servlet.filter  
    net.threescale.api.v2
    This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend.

    • Uses of Api2 in net.threescale.api

      Methods in net.threescale.api that return Api2 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2Api(String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Version 2 Api object using DEFAULT_3SCALE_PROVIDER_API_URL
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2Api(String url, String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Version 2 Api object.
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2Api(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender)
      Creates a new Server Api object, with out any caching.
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2ApiWithCache(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender, ApiCache cache)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object with a user specified cache and http sender.
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url, String provider_private_key)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and default http sender.
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2ApiWithLocalCache(String url, String provider_private_key, HttpSender sender)
      Creates a new Cached Server Api object using the default local cache parameters in etc/default.xml and a user specified http sender (mainly for testing).
      static Api2 ApiFactory.createV2ApiWithRemoteCache(String url, String provider_private_key, String path_to_config)
      Creates a Cached Server Api object with cache paramter file specificed by the user.

    • Uses of Api2 in net.threescale.api.servlet.filter

      Methods in net.threescale.api.servlet.filter that return Api2 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Api2 AuthorizeServletFilter.createApi2Server()
      Creates the 3Scale API Server according to the API Factory defined by AuthorizeServletFilter.factoryClass.
      protected Api2 AuthorizeServletFilter.getServer()
      Guarded by a lock, it securely obtains a reference to the Api2 Server.

    • Uses of Api2 in net.threescale.api.v2

      Classes in net.threescale.api.v2 that implement Api2 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Api2Impl
      Concrete implementation of the Version 2 API.
